charges.charge_description: 21:846 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS possess with intent to distribute and distribute cocaine and cocaine base (commonly known as"crack"cocaine), both Schedule II controlled substances, said conspiracy involving a quantity of cocaine and 50 grams or more of"crack"cocaine, in violation of 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(A); forfeiture allegations (1)

21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(C) NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE possess with intent to distribute and did distribute a quantity of cocaine base (commonly known as"crack"cocaine, a Schedule II controlled substance; forfeiture allegations (2-4)

21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(A) NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE did possess with intent to distribute 50 grams or more of cocaine base (commonly known as"crack"cocaine), a Schedule II controlled substance; forfeiture allegation (5)

18:924(c)(1)(A) VIOLENT CRIME/DRUGS/MACHINE GUN used and carried firearms during and in relation to, and possessed firearms in furtherance of, a drug trafficking crime, which is prosecutable in a court of the United States; forfeiture allegations (6)

21:841, 21:846-Defendant did possess with intent to distribute and did distribute crack cocaine and did conspire to possess with intent to distribute powder cocaine and crack cocaine in violation of 21:841(a)(1) and 846
